title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Mobile-Based Math Video Instructional Design for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical concepts by applying Gagné's Nine Events of Instruction (Gain Attention-Present Objective-Recall Prior Knowledge-Present Stimulus-Guide Learning-Provide Feedback) through video content under 3 minutes.
Learners can perform error correction and concept application processes with over 85% accuracy through simple quizzes embedded in the video.
Learners can watch at least two videos in a mobile environment three times a week and participate in formative assessments to achieve at least 70% mastery of the learning content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
